class.screen: create type vspx_check_box under vspx_field self as ref temporary constructor method vspx_check_box (name varchar, parent vspx_control), overriding method vc_render () returns any, overriding method vc_pre_render () returns any, overriding method vc_view_state (stream any) returns any, overriding method vc_set_view_state (e vspx_event) returns any ;

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vspx_check_boxis a representation of HTML check box. Scriptable, databindable.

refsect2.title: name
refsect2.para: A unique name identifying the control.

refsect2.title: initial-enable
refsect2.para: Designates is control visible or not initially. Could be data-bound to an SQL expression.

refsect2.title: value
refsect2.para: Data bindable value of control, represents value of HTML control to be drawn.

refsect2.title: group-name
refsect2.para: When more check boxes needs to be grouped, this is a name of group. When post such control name of group will be received on post rather than name of control.

refsect2.title: initial-checked
refsect2.para: This flag designate is that particular item is checked initially or not.

example.title: Simple example
example.para: This is to draw single check-box
example.screen: <v:check-box name="cb1" initial-checked="0" value="-- case control.ufl_selected when 1 then 'abc' else 'cde' end" />
